trans-unit.source: This API will restart the replica (equivalent of ReportFault - Temporary) specified by the passed in <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: This API will restart the replica (equivalent of ReportFault - Temporary) specified by the passed in <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference>.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceManagementClient instance on which the API is called.
trans-unit.target: The ServiceManagementClient instance on which the API is called.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference> which indicates the replica to be restarted.
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.ReplicaSelector</codeEntityReference> which indicates the replica to be restarted.

trans-unit.source: This API can only be called for persisted service replicas.
trans-unit.target: This API can only be called for persisted service replicas.

trans-unit.source: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.CompletionMode</codeEntityReference> that specifies whether to wait until the restart of the replica is complete or not DoNotVerify - Return after triggering the restart of the replica Verify - Return after the remove completes
trans-unit.target: The <codeEntityReference>T:System.Fabric.Testability.CompletionMode</codeEntityReference> that specifies whether to wait until the restart of the replica is complete or not DoNotVerify - Return after triggering the restart of the replica Verify - Return after the remove completes

trans-unit.source: RestartReplicaResult which gives information about the actual selected replica.
trans-unit.target: RestartReplicaResult which gives information about the actual selected replica.

trans-unit.source: Action took more than its allocated time.
trans-unit.target: Action took more than its allocated time.

trans-unit.source: Any of the required arguments are null.
trans-unit.target: Any of the required arguments are null.

trans-unit.source: These are the fabric failures FabricErrorCode.ReplicaDoesNotExist - If the Selected replica was not found FabricErrorCode.PartitionNotFound - if the specified partition selected does not exist.
trans-unit.target: These are the fabric failures FabricErrorCode.ReplicaDoesNotExist - If the Selected replica was not found FabricErrorCode.PartitionNotFound - if the specified partition selected does not exist.
